button.label: Import from Anki
button.screentip: Import Anki export file and convert to Excel format
button.supertip: Select an Anki export file (.txt) and convert it to Excel format for easy editing. The Python script will clean HTML formatting and preserve all data.

button.label: Export to Anki
button.screentip: Export current Excel data to Anki format
button.supertip: Convert the current Excel worksheet data back to Anki-compatible format (.txt) with proper UTF-8 encoding.

button.label: Validate Format
button.screentip: Validate current data for Anki compatibility
button.supertip: Check that all required fields (GUID, Deck, Croatian, English) are present in the current worksheet.

button.label: Help
button.supertip: Display help information about using the Anki Tools.
